name: biewer-website
description: Website fÃ¼r die Pension Biewer in Ockfen

scripts.lint: echo '=> linting' && eslint -c ./.eslintrc.json src/js/**.js && eslint -c ./.eslintrc.json server/**.js
scripts.css: echo '=> converting less to css' && mkdir -p public/style && lessc src/style/style.less public/css/style.css
scripts.js: echo '=> making js files ready for browser' && mkdir -p public/js && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js public/js/bootstrap.min.js && cp src/js/**.js public/js/
scripts.img: echo '=> copying the assets' && mkdir -p public/assets && cp src/assets/* public/assets/
scripts.minify: echo '=> minify all ressources' && minify public/js/main.js > public/js/main.min.js && rm public/js/main.js && mv public/js/main.min.js public/js/main.js && mkdir -p public/style && lessc --clean-css src/style/style.less public/css/style.css
scripts.dependencies: echo '=> getting dependencies' && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css public/css/bootstrap.min.css && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js public/js/bootstrap.min.js && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.slim.min.js public/js/jquery.slim.min.js && cp node_modules/popper.js/dist/popper.min.js public/js/popper.min.js && mkdir -p public/fonts && cp -R node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/* public/fonts && cp node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css public/css/font-awesome.min.css && cp node_modules/ekko-lightbox/dist/ekko-lightbox.css public/css/ekko-lightbox.css && cp node_modules/ekko-lightbox/dist/ekko-lightbox.js public/js/ekko-lightbox.js
scripts.clean: echo '=> cleaning project' && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf public
scripts.build: echo '=> building project' && npm run lint && npm run css && npm run js && npm run img && npm run minify
scripts.debug: echo '=> building debug project' && npm run lint && npm run css && npm run js && npm run img
